DataSourcePortable.Name: Adiantamento clientes em aberto
DataSourcePortable.Content:
<DataSourceDefinition> <FromSql Alias="A" SelectCommand="SELECT COUNT(A.HANDLE) QTDE, SUM(B.VALOR-B.VALORESBAIXADOS) SALDO, SUM(B.VALOR) VALORTOTAL
 FROM FN_DOCUMENTOS A, FN_PARCELAS B, GN_OPERACOES C
 WHERE B.DOCUMENTO = A.HANDLE
 AND A.OPERACAO = C.HANDLE
 AND C.CODIGOINTERNO <> 29
 AND A.EHPREVISAO <> 'S'
 AND (B.DOCUMENTOSUSPENSO <> 'S' OR B.DOCUMENTOSUSPENSO IS NULL)
 AND (B.EMABERTO = 'S')
 AND A.TIPODEMOVIMENTO = 2
 AND A.ENTRADASAIDA = 'S'
" /> <Fields> <Field Alias="QTDE" From="A" Path="QTDE" /> <Field Alias="SALDO" From="A" Path="SALDO" /> <Field Alias="VALORTOTAL" From="A" Path="VALORTOTAL" /> </Fields> </DataSourceDefinition>
